header.title: Purge Suit
header.tagline: Survive the Chaos – Equip Yourself with the Purge Suit

overview.title: Overview
overview.text: The Purge Suit is a custom-designed combat suit engineered to provide maximum protection during a planet's annual purge. This high-tech suit is built to withstand extreme violence, featuring advanced armor and tactical capabilities that ensure the wearer's survival in chaotic environments.

team.title: Agents
team.text: Developed by a team of engineers and combat specialists, the Purge Suit embodies cutting-edge technology and innovative design for maximum efficiency during crises.

problem.title: Problem
problem.text: During the annual purge, citizens face extreme threats and violence from others, requiring effective means of protection to survive the night.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: The Purge Suit offers enhanced durability and protection against weapons and environmental hazards, empowering users to navigate the dangers of the purge with confidence.

list.name: Adaptive Armor Technology
list.description: Equipped with advanced armor that adapts to different levels of impact and damage, providing optimal protection.

list.name: Tactical Augmentation Systems
list.description: Integrated systems that enhance user agility, strength, and reflexes, allowing for superior performance during confrontations.

list.name: Built-In Communication Systems
list.description: Facilitates real-time communication with allies, ensuring coordination and strategic planning during the purge.

list.name: Environmental Protection Gear
list.description: Protects against environmental hazards, such as toxic fumes or extreme weather, ensuring survival in any situation.

list.name: Stealth Mode Activation
list.description: Allows users to blend into their surroundings, making it harder for adversaries to detect them during critical moments.

useCases.title: Urban Survival
useCases.description: Designed for urban environments, the Purge Suit enables users to traverse dangerous streets safely while avoiding threats.

useCases.title: Defense Operations
useCases.description: Used by law enforcement and private security during the purge to protect civilians and themselves from violence.

useCases.title: Rescue Missions
useCases.description: Ideal for rescue teams operating during the purge, allowing them to navigate hostile environments while ensuring their safety.

useCases.title: Self-Defense Training
useCases.description: The suit is utilized in self-defense training courses, equipping individuals with the skills and confidence to survive an encounter.

future.title: The Future of the Purge Suit
future.text: With advancements in materials and technology, future iterations of the Purge Suit may incorporate enhanced AI-assisted defense mechanisms and improved environmental adaptability, ensuring users remain one step ahead in any crisis.
